sentences.en: A computer - oriented language whose instructions consist only of computer instructions.
sentences.cn: 一种面向计算机的语言,其指令只由计算机指令组成.

sentences.en: Both books are strongly solution - oriented.
sentences.cn: 这两本书都是以解题为主的.

sentences.en: Food sources also elicit oriented locomotion and recognition behavior patterns in most insects.
sentences.cn: 食物源也引诱大多数昆虫定向迁移和识别行为.

sentences.en: He oriented himself by finding a familiar landscape.
sentences.cn: 他发现一处熟悉的景色,从而确定了自己所处的方位.

sentences.en: High frequency gusts are usually measured by high response research - oriented anemometers.
sentences.cn: 高频突风通常是用高速响应的研究性定向风速计测量.

sentences.en: In the case of productivity tools and other non - entertainment - oriented products, this optimization means minimizing work.
sentences.cn: 对于生产工具和其他 非 娱乐导向的产品而言, 这意味着将工作负荷降至最低.

sentences.en: It seems almost inevitable that North African economies will still be primarily oriented toward Europe.
sentences.cn: 看来可以预见的是，北非经济仍会主要面向欧洲。

sentences.en: It seems almost inevitable that North African economies will still be primarily oriented towards Europe.
sentences.cn: 看来北非经济体几乎注定还将以欧洲为主导。

sentences.en: Most students here are oriented to computers.
sentences.cn: 这里的大部分学生都对计算机感兴趣。

sentences.en: Our students are oriented towards science subjects.
sentences.cn: 我们教的学生都是理科方向的。

sentences.en: Our whole programme is spiritually oriented but not religious.
sentences.cn: 我们的整个节目都是关注心灵的，但却不是宗教性的。

sentences.en: People must learn to be goal - oriented and work to achieve given ends.
sentences.cn: 人们应学会以目标为指导和为达到既定目标而工作.

sentences.en: The building is oriented south and north.
Their knowledge of the sea was oriented towards winds.
sentences.cn: 那时他们对海洋的知识侧重于风.

sentences.en: This book is oriented towards so - called syntax - directed methods of compiling.
sentences.cn: 本书以介绍 所谓 “句法制导的编译方法”作为准则.

sentences.en: Transformed cells are loosely attached, rounded and randomly oriented.
sentences.cn: 转化细胞则不大贴壁 、 圆缩并呈杂乱分布.

words.tran_cn: 方向；定向；适应；情况介绍；向东方
使适应；确定方向；使朝东
导向的；定向的；以…为方向的
调整；使朝向（orient的过去分词）；确定…的方位

phrases.tran_cn: 面向对象的；对象趋向的；物件导向的
面向用户的；使用者导向的

trans.tran_cn: 对…感兴趣的，以…为方向的，重视…的
trans.tran_en: If someone is oriented toward or oriented to a particular thing or person, they are mainly concerned with that thing or person

trans.tran_cn: 调整；使朝向（orient的过去分词）；确定…的方位
